thread.title: Dont hug the middle finger An etiquette guide to Apples new emojis
thread.title_full: Dont hug the middle finger An etiquette guide to Apples new emojis

title: Dont hug the middle finger An etiquette guide to Apples new emojis
text:
Don't hug the middle finger! An etiquette guide to Apple's new emojis 
Cnet Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Apple put more than 150 new emojis in its latest iOS update, but just when is it appropriate to send someone an image of a block of cheese or a levitating man? CNET's Danny Gallagher plays Miss Manners....
